text:
After celebrating and enjoying Diwali festivities, B-town is now back to the normal grind. Most of them have resumed their work. Lovebirds and Bollywood's hottest couple Ranbir and Alia have resumed preps for their upcoming film Brahmastra.
Pinterest
Paps clicked the rumoured couple Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor outside a dance class in Mumbai's Khar.
The pictures of Ranbir and Alia making an appearance together is a treat for all their fans and after a long time, paps managed to spot the rumoured couple together. Both Ranbir and Alia looked tired in the pictures. Take a look.

title: Ranbir Kapoor-Alia Bhatt Resume Brahmastra Preps, Begin With Dance Practice For The Film
description: After celebrating and enjoying Diwali festivities, B-town is now back to the normal grind. Most of them have resumed their work. Lovebirds and Bollywood's hottest couple Ranbir and Alia have resumed preps for their upcoming film Brahmastra Paps clicked the rumored couple Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor outside a dance class in Mumbai's Khar.
